replacement.value: This sample demonstrates the use of the WordPatterns component to find words which have the same pattern as an input word (search pattern). In this example, TREE has the pattern 1233 which is the same as the words ball, bass, bell etc.\line When starting the play mode, the wordlist will be processed once. After that, you can change the input word to obtain new results interactively without having to re-process the entire wordlist.
